name: Corrupted Shade.
description:
Color and Detail are gone, the world is a Black and White Mess. Adventure into the depths of your workplace to gather the final piece of a device to restore color to your monotone hell. 

Corrupted Shade is a story focus platformer made for the B&W Jam by Lone Rabbit.

Arrow Key Controls

I plan to do more with this post-jam, so feel free to give some criticism and support where you see fit! Have fun with my game, and have a nice day!
